00022 #include "mt/proto/smpp/pdu/data_sm.hpp"
00023 
00026 Smpp::DataSm::DataSm() :
00027     Request(CommandLength(MinLength),
00028     CommandId(CommandId::DataSm),
00029     SequenceNumber::Min)
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00041 Smpp::DataSm::DataSm(
00042         const SequenceNumber& sequenceNumber,
00043         const ServiceType& serviceType,
00044         const SmeAddress& sourceAddr,
00045         const SmeAddress& destinationAddr,
00046         const EsmClass& esmClass,
00047         const RegisteredDelivery& registeredDelivery,
00048         const DataCoding& dataCoding) :
00049     Request(CommandLength(MinLength),
00050              CommandId(CommandId::DataSm),
00051              sequenceNumber),
00052     service_type_(serviceType),
00053     source_addr_(sourceAddr),
00054     destination_addr_(destinationAddr),
00055     esm_class_(esmClass),
00056     registered_delivery_(registeredDelivery),
00057     data_coding_(dataCoding)
00058 {
00059     Header::update_length(service_type_.length() +
00060                            source_addr_.address().length() +
00061                            destination_addr_.address().length());
00062 }
00063 
00066 Smpp::DataSm::DataSm(const Smpp::Uint8* b) :
00067     Request(CommandLength(MinLength), CommandId(CommandId::DataSm), 1)
00068 {
00069     decode(b);
00070 }
00071 
00072 Smpp::DataSm::~DataSm()
00073 {
00074 }
00075 
00079 const Smpp::Uint8*
00080 Smpp::DataSm::encode()
00081 {
00082     buff_.reset(Header::command_length());
00083 
00084     Request::encode(buff_); // insert the header first
00085     buff_ += service_type_;
00086     buff_ += source_addr_;
00087     buff_ += destination_addr_;
00088     buff_ += esm_class_;
00089     buff_ += registered_delivery_;
00090     buff_ += data_coding_;
00091 
00092     Header::encode_tlvs(buff_);
00093 
00094     return buff_.get();
00095 }
00096 
00100 void
00101 Smpp::DataSm::decode(const Smpp::Uint8* buff)
00102 {
00103     Request::decode(buff);
00104 
00105     Smpp::Uint32 len = Request::command_length();
00106     Smpp::Uint32 offset = 16;
00107     const char* err = "Bad length in data_sm";
00108     if(len < offset)
00109         throw Error(err);
00110 
00111     const Smpp::Char* sptr = reinterpret_cast<const Smpp::Char*>(buff);
00112     service_type_ = &sptr[offset];
00113     offset += service_type_.length() + 1;
00114 
00115     if(len < offset)
00116         throw Error(err);
00117 
00118     source_addr_.decode(buff+offset, len - offset);
00119     offset += source_addr_.address().length() + 3; // ton + npi + '\0'
00120 
00121     if(len < offset)
00122         throw Error(err);
00123 
00124     destination_addr_.decode(buff+offset, len - offset);
00125     offset += destination_addr_.address().length() + 3; // ton + npi + '\0'
00126 
00127     if(len < offset)
00128         throw Error(err);
00129 
00130     esm_class_ = buff[offset];
00131     ++offset;
00132 
00133     if(len < offset)
00134         throw Error(err);
00135 
00136     registered_delivery_ = buff[offset];
00137     ++offset;
00138 
00139     if(len < offset)
00140         throw Error(err);
00141 
00142     data_coding_ = buff[offset];
00143     ++offset;
00144 
00145     if(len < offset)
00146         throw Error(err);
00147 
00148     Header::decode_tlvs(buff + offset, len - offset);
00149 }
